name: Abandon Ship (itch) (SpaceyLake)
description:
This is a game developed for Ludum Dare 50 under the theme delay the inevitable.

The game is a space shooting game about keeping a spaceship from being destroyed while the crew is evacuating . 

The game is a twin stick shooter and support both keyboard and controller input.

Narrative:

Your ship is under attack by generic space monsters and as the unpaid intern it falls to you to delay the inevitble destruction of the ship to give your crew time to evacuate and then escape yourself.

Note:

The Linux and Windows build is recommended over the web for the best experience as web has worse performance.
